definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: I put the silencer on my gun and Jeff did the same.
sentences.chinese: 我在枪上装上消声器，杰夫也把消音器安好。

sentences.english: A gun with a silencer fires once.
sentences.chinese: 一把带着消音器的枪立即开火了。

sentences.english: He’s a craftsman whose specialties include hand-made bullets and silencers.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位手工艺者，长于土制子弹和消音器。

sentences.english: Gunmen equipped with silencers then riddled his car with bullets.
sentences.chinese: 枪手用装有消音器的枪向他的汽车射击。

sentences.english: Once he was asked how he got the idea for the Maxim Silencer.
sentences.chinese: 一次，有人问他怎么想到马克西姆消音器这个点子。

sentences.english: After the mechanic replaced the silencer, my car was as right as a trivet.
sentences.chinese: 修理工更换了消音器后，我的汽车又正常了。

sentences.english: The muffler is inside the heat shield.
sentences.chinese: 消音器安装于加热保护罩内部。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the turbo-charger be provided with a filter-silencer.
sentences.chinese: 建议涡轮增压器装上过滤消音器。

sentences.english: The exhaust duct consists of a heat shield and a muffler .
sentences.chinese: 排放管道包括一个加热保护罩和一个消音器。

sentences.english: They were once sold in hardware stores.
sentences.chinese: 消音器曾经一度在五金商店里销售。

sentences.english: The assailants used silencers, a new gangland-style twist to their attacks.
sentences.chinese: 攻击者在袭击中使用了黑社会风格的消音器。

sentences.english: It had a split in the muffler .
sentences.chinese: 它后面的消音器已有一条裂缝。

sentences.english: They’re legal in 39 states and fairly easy to buy.
sentences.chinese: 消音器在39个州可以合法购买，并且手续非常简单。

definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
